verses.roman:
eta bali' rāghavere kaila āliṅgane
ei-mata sammānila sarva bhakta-gaṇe

synonyms: eta bali'-saying this; rāghavere—Rāghava Paṇḍita; kaila āliṅgane—He embraced; ei-mata—in this way; sammānila—showed respect; sarva—all; bhakta-gaṇe—to the devotees.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu then mercifully embraced Rāghava Paṇḍita. The Lord also offered all the other devotees a reception with similar respect.
